channel.title: React on WebSnippet is a blog to share top quality open source resources for developers
channel.description: Recent content in React on WebSnippet is a blog to share top quality open source resources for developers

item.title: Making Your First Webapp with React
item.author: mirodil@websnippet.io (Mirodil)
item.description: React has gained a lot of popularity recently and has attracted a large and active community. This results in a vast wealth of reusable components for it that will save you time when coding. The library itself encourages writing loosely coupled code that is modular and composable. In this tutorial, I will show you how to create a small application and how to split it into discrete components that talk to each other.
